extendedInfo.description: DW Contacts & PhoneIs a powerful (MUST HAVE) extension for your stock dialer, contacts and phone management applicationIt focuses on business functions. Improve the efficiency of your work.KEY FEATURES------------+ You can write a note for the call records+ In call widget: extended incoming call view (show organization, group, notes, group picture, edit note in calling)+ Call filter: blocking incoming calls on free definable date- and time zones+ Contact filtering: Based on the contact group, job title, company filtration contacts+ Call Statistics: Show the duration of your call. When the end of the free talk time to be notified.+ Quick-jump: show a window, where you can click the first letter of your contact and quickly jump/scroll to it+ Contact details: Displays all the contact information together (sms, call log, call Statistics, events)+ multi-language support (Thank all the enthusiastic user provides translation for DWC)+ most functions are accessible by using the *LONG PRESS* (tap and hold) on any item or use *MENU* key+ very flexible to configure the design of every view (sort order, fonts size, color, transparency)+ configurable contact view, how it should show the list (*show contacts as* / *sort order* for last name, first name, nick name, ...)+ tab bars: hide & sortable, include gesture switching to different views (phone, history, favorites, contacts, search, groups, organization, titles, events, toolbox)+ full management for your contacts (create, add, change, delete, copy contacts, copy to another account, groups, organization, titles in single- and multi select mode)+ batch mode for mass delivery with SMS, MMS, emails on single- and multi selection (contacts, groups, organizations, titles)+ search contacts by any attribute (name, nick name, phone number, organization, notes, address, email, relationships, websites, birthday, ...) + voice search+ support for layered groups, sub-groups (sub-group via Business.VIP = Business -> VIP)+ set ringtones on single- and multi select (contacts, groups, organizations, titles)+ contact event notification and contact event management (birthday, anniversary) + support for lunar calendar format+ easy sending event greetings to your contacts+ create shortcut to home on any contact item or on any tab via toolbox+ share contacts (text,vcard) via SMS, email, ...+ display call history with summary for single- or multi-select contacts, groups, organization, titles, ...+ dialer(phone) with T9-search - has many options to make it exactly to your wishes -> dialer and dialpad scalable and adjustable in size, background, color, font size can be changed -> full T9-search on all contacts fields and configurable -> quick dial manager: Supports up to 1000 speed dial numbers. Dialing 100th number by entering #100 -> quick dial last number:  -> display call history on dialer -> edit number before dialingPlease honor our work and buy the PRO version, which is very favorable in the light of functionality!Hints: If you have any suggestion for improvements -> please write on forum: http://forum.dw-p.net or use the *Feedback via email* function in settings menu. If you upgrade to a newer version and it fails to start (if download or install is not possible), please try to uninstall previous version before. More tips & tricks see on forum http://forum.dw-p.net/viewforum.php?f=9Please try our software and recommend it to your friends.Free version is limited on some functions: - advertising messages - theme customizations are limited - multi-select limited to 5 items per action - background service for contact events notification (reminder for birthday) - send event greetings

reviews.title: So many features!
reviews.comment: There are so many different ways to make this program your own. You don\'t have to settle for what someone else likes. I highly recommend this program over what comes with the phone.
reviews.author: Dave Cook

reviews.title: Powerful
reviews.comment: Initially I was going to rate this app lower because there was so much that it could do: that I was having a difficult time understanding how to get it to do what \"I\" wanted it to do.  Be patient and read the online manual.
reviews.author: Thomas Martin

reviews.title: Love this app!!!!
reviews.comment: Waiting for some more exciting simple changes...but this app is more than I can ask for....wish I could just take the stock out permanently and just have this....NEED NO OTHER!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Tonia Phillips

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Only one thing makes me frustrated.  I choose a contact in dialer. And suddenly it takes me to the history of calls within this specific contact. And here comes the trouble - it removes the association of this phone number to contact. Thus the number becomes deleted from phonebook completely. It happens not very often. But how to cure it? Had anybody experienced the same?
reviews.author: Oles Yasinsky

reviews.title: Default setting problem
reviews.comment: The app is nice, I\'ve been using it for long time. Unfortunately I came up against an unpleasant thing: it began to not keep \"default launch\" setting. So after every reboot I need to set it up again. I tried free version and it works fine. The problem is only in pro app. I also tried to clear all app-data and reinstall it, but it was no use. Lurking in the app\'s forum didn\'t help me...

reviews.title: Can\'t access forum, doesn\'t work for dial codes
reviews.comment: I tried to signup to the forum for support, where it asks the current version number, I entered 2.5.4.1 and 2.5.4.0 and 2.5.4 and nothing would work?  What\'s up with that?  Also, when I try to enter android dial codes (such as *#*#CHECKIN*#*#  it doesn\'t work... it tries to make a voice call.  As a workaround I\'m using the default dialer.
reviews.author: Gerald Cox

reviews.title: Better than standard Dialer Program.
reviews.comment: Has way bettwr features and UI than what was default on phone. I like my phone custom,  even if it is just the font or background, control makes the phone more \"Me.\" Hai Capito?  Krj4b
reviews.author: Karl Brandt

reviews.title: The best on a market!
reviews.comment: Great app and great support!
reviews.author: Yuriy Perelman

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: You should tag this so it comes up under customer database, contacts, etc. Not just dialer. I\'ve been looking for weeks and just stumbled upon it.
reviews.author: Bj McCarty

reviews.title: Better interface:
reviews.comment: Pretty good app. Will be even better once you incorporate an actual dialer that replaces the stock one as well as replace the stock contact page under the contact tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow.......
reviews.comment: After 6 months the app is too is too slow to use...
reviews.author: Steve Seaney

reviews.title: Excellent Functionality but Confusing Settings UI
reviews.comment: *PROS* Grouping Options (by custom group, custom subgroup, profession, organisation; hide system groups & google groups); UI Display Customisation (excellent range); Icons (assign any photo or icon to user or group). *CONS* Settings UI / Menu Hierarchy (convoluted, confusing; eg global vs phone vs tab vs detail- which one takes precedence?; tab settings are much cleaner and clearer); Display Refresh Speed (very slow rendering of phone number beneath name, and icons for groups; blank if scroll; not cached?)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: So much better than the stock dialer... This app keeps getting better & better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.comment: I have around 13000 contacts in my address book.  It becomes quite slow while searching names... Otherwise best option...
reviews.author: Sachin Jadhav

reviews.title: DW for Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: This was best when I was using S2 but in S4 due to lag in basic dialer and contacts apps this is not giving same performance. Developer pls help. Exdialer is performing more faster but still bcoz I m fan of dis app installed again to see the differences if any. Need support. Samsung is giving least priority in contacts and dialer section. Help help help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not install
reviews.comment: Contact names not showing after last update 2.5.3.0 and MUCH  slower. No way to contact developer. Sucks.
reviews.author: Bill Beavers

reviews.title: Outstanding APP.  HTC One
reviews.comment: Been using for a couple years and always able to work out issues that seem to go along with new phones and software updates.  Customer service is beyond expectations. Pro version has been worth the price.  Many thanks to Devin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app!
reviews.author: Robert Brickey

reviews.title: Best Contact Manager
reviews.comment: It simply DOES EVERYTHING related to Contacts...
reviews.author: Stelian Ionescu

reviews.title: \"Complete action using...\"
reviews.comment: I hate the fact that even though I select DW and \"always\" in response to the subject request, I continually have to do so :( Please advise me what to do or FIX this if it\'s a software problem... Thx  Other than that,  the functionality it GREAT!   I will give this 5 stars once I\'m without the problem.
reviews.author: Anthony Marino
